00023 class iAVCBufferList
00024 {
00025 public:
00026    // The following 4 values describe the buffers that still need output values inserted
00027    iAVCBufferList *  mpNext;
00028    void *            mpLeftBuffer;
00029    void *            mpRightBuffer;
00030    sampleCount       mnLen;            // number of entries in buffers
00031    sampleCount       mnNext;        // next output position in buffers
00032 };

00039 // IMPORTANT:  This define determines type of sample: float or short int
00040 #define  IAVC_FLOAT        // use floating point in iAVC
00041 
00042 #include "SimplePairedTwoTrack.h"

00047 class AvcCompressorDialog;          // defined later in this file

00049 #ifdef IAVC_FLOAT
00050    #define AVCCOMPSAMPLETYPE  floatSample
00051 #else
00052    #define AVCCOMPSAMPLETYPE  int16Sample
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 //typedef for IAVCSAMPLETYPE is in iAVC.h

00057 class EffectAvcCompressor: public EffectSimplePairedTwoTrack<IAVCSAMPLETYPE,AVCCOMPSAMPLETYPE> {
00058    
00059 public:
00060    
00061    EffectAvcCompressor();
00062 
00063    virtual ~EffectAvcCompressor();
00064    
00065    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00066       return wxString(wxT("Automatic Volume Control..."));
00067    }
00068    
00069    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00070       return wxString(wxT("Changing volume"));
00071    }
00072    
00073    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00074    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00075 
00076    virtual void End();
00077    
00078 protected:
00079 
00080    virtual bool PromptUser();    // invoked by Effect
00081    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00082    virtual bool Init();          // invoked by Effect
00083 
00084    // invoked by SimplePairedTwoTrack
00085    bool ProcessSimplePairedTwoTrack ( /*IAVCSAMPLETYPE*/ void *bufferLeft, 
00086                              /*IAVCSAMPLETYPE*/ void *bufferRight, // may be 0
00087                              sampleCount len);
00088    AutoVolCtrl  mAutoVolCtrl; // iAVC class (LGPL license)
00089    long  mnChangeWindow;
00090 
00091    iAVCBufferList * mpBufferList;
00092    iAVCBufferList * mpBufferPrevious;
00093 
00094    long         mnDelay;      // delay between when sample set and when it got.
00095 
00096    AvcCompressorDialog* mpDialog;
00097 
00098 private:
00099    void OutputSample ( IAVCSAMPLETYPE left, IAVCSAMPLETYPE right );
00100 
00101 };
